segments.text: I notice the boy is about to fall, and I’m shocked no one is stopping him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so unstable, and he’s just reaching for more cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor makes it even more dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman hasn’t turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, not even trying to help.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to crash any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so unpredictable—I don’t know what will happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the water or the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring out, and she’s just drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she is in the middle of all this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
